metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9058 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is an infinite loop in the runzip_fd function of runzip.c. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted lrz file.

criterions.comment: lrzip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180517-1').
